entry.title: EO-53 (mr.fox hanging)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Hangings & Ornaments
Price: 6.50

This adorable and whimsical felted ornament could grace any home through the holiday season or any season. They are made of 100% wool by needle-felting techniques. This simple, yet creative decor creates peaceful and harmonious environment to any room or can be a special gift for any occasions. 

size: 4" Ht.
composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
